mapper.select: SELECT max(max_serial) FROM gs_sys_serial_num where sys_date=#{date} and serl_type=#{tp}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gs_sys_serial_num (id, module_name, module_code, config_templet, max_serial, pre_max_num, is_auto_increment, sys_date,serl_type) VALUES (#{id}, #{moduleName}, #{moduleCode}, #{configTemplet}, #{maxSerial}, #{preMaxNum},#{isAutoIncrement}, #{sysDate},#{serlType})
